objectNumberTooltip: The number of objects displayed here includes the total set of objects, their versions, and objects with a delete marker
disableEncryptionDesc1: The data stored in your bucket is not currently encrypted.
disableEncryptionDesc2: Get a simplified encryption solution with SSE-OMK.
enableEncryptionDesc1: New objects stored in the bucket are automatically encrypted.
encryptionTooltip: This type of encryption simplifies the process by using keys managed by OVHcloud. This method is ideal for customers who want a robust encryption solution without the complexities of key management.
activateEncryptionDescription: Enable server-side encryption with keys managed by OVHcloud to secure your data at rest.
activateEncryptionWarning: Once enabled, encryption will only apply to new uploads, and can no longer be disabled.
disableVersionning: Protect your data now. Enable versioning to easily restore your objects in the event that they are accidentally deleted or modified.
enableVersionning: Your objects are versioned to guarantee better traceability and recovery in the event that they are lost or modified.
activateVersionningDescription: Automatically saves multiple versions of objects to avoid accidental deletion, or when new objects are uploaded.
activateObjectLockDescription: Prevents objects from being deleted or modified to protect your data from accidental deletion.
activateObjectLockToastSuccessDescriptio: The Object Lock has been enabled
editObjectLockDescription: Using Object Lock, you can store objects in WORM (Write Once, Read Many) mode, which ensures their immutability by blocking any changes or deletions once saved. <0>Learn more</0>
objectLockComplianceModeWarning: When the Compliance mode is enabled, objects are locked and cannot be changed during the set retention period. You cannot edit or delete any objects. This means you can only delete objects by closing the associated account. <0></0><1>Learn more about the Compliance mode</1>.
objectLockRetentionModeDescription_gover: During the set retention period, users with the right permissions can edit or delete objects.
objectLockRetentionModeDescription_compl: During the set retention period, objects cannot be edited or deleted.
editObjectLockToastSuccessDescription: Object Lock options have been updated
errorDurationMax: The maximum period is 100 years or 36,500 days.
errorRuleRequired: A retention policy is required to enable the default Object Lock.
